name: SuperCode
description:
This is my first ever playable game I made. Its based on the old logicgame named "Supercode" or "Mastermind". Goal of the game is to find the right colorcode with hints you get after each round.

The game is a prototype, so I cant give you promise that everything works fine for now, but I will use my freetime to push it further and hopefully you will have some fun with it. This project
